AboutMe.name: Caro CodingK
description: Hello, World!

I'm Caro, a motivated Junior Software Engineer with a degree in Computer Science and Electronics Engineering. I absolutely love tech and enjoy building fun stuff on the web. I've spent a lot of time working on personal projects, mostly web apps using React.js, and I enjoy bringing creative ideas to life through code.

Beyond web development, I've dabbled in some pretty cool projects involving natural language processing, computer vision, and robotics. I'm comfortable with Python, JavaScript, and C++, and I’m always excited to dive into new tools and technologies.
I really enjoy solving problems, learning by doing, and teaming up with others to create things that make a difference. Let’s connect and chat!

point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution

editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem
ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have
evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected
humour and the like).
